text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: La-laaah, la-la-laaah! ♪ Oh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On my day off, I decide to go out<n>shopping. Upon stepping
outside, I run<n>into Smart Falcon.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Are you going out too? I'm on my<n>way to get some creative
input! ♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
For how to become the most cute 'n'<n>sparkly Umadol ever,
of course!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
The other day, this one super popular<n>idol said, "I made it to
where I am<n>today thanks to all the input I got!"

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
So I figured I need more input too! So<n>much that I can't fit
any more into my<n>head! And just enough that I don't<n>go
crazy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...This sounds slightly concerning.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Huh? I mean, sure—if you're willing!<n>I'll take all the advice I
can get! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: First, we go to a movie theater to<n>watch a musical.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Sniff... That last scene waswonderful... I didn't think thebartender would be a descendant ofthe Mozart...
choice_data_list: The songs and choreography were amazing too.
The songs and choreography were amazing too.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Yep! You can really tell how much<n>everyone loves their craft!
It's a bit<n>different from Umadol stuff, but I think<n>
performances like these are special in<n>their own way! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Next, we head to an amusement park<n>famous for its
parades.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Look at that mascot character<n>over there! It's so
round, but its<n>movements are so sharp!
choice_data_list: Whoever they are, they're a total pro.
Whoever they are, they're a total pro.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh! You'd definitely have to<n>practice every day to move
like that!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Okay, I'm gonna practice back<n>handsprings 'til I can do ten
in a row<n>in any outfit!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We hit the streets and soon stumble<n>upon a freestyle rap
battle going on<n>outside.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, a rap battle! This is the first<n>time I've seen
something like this in<n>real life! Th-they're really into it!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
This is a clash of two strong<n>personalities, right? Identity is
an<n>important part of being an Umadol, but<n>I don't know if
I'm on their level yet...
choice_data_list: No need to compare yourself to a rapper.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But I think it'd be better to havesome kind of persona! Wouldn'tthat be more fun to watch?!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I need to develop one interesting<n>enough to beat those
rappers! Maybe<n>something edgy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I feel like we're veering off track<n>here...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As we return to the station, the sound<n>of a powerful drum
fills the air. I look<n>around, but there's not a drum to be<n>
found—only a lone, empty-handed<n>performer.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Wow! Air drums!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
That's so cool! The performer's air<n>drumsticks perfectly
match the music<n>coming from the speakers!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
It's like there are real drums there!<n>How do you move your
body so freely<n>like that?! All I can do is sing and<n>dance...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm... If I practice enough, maybe I<n>can do that too! Air
drums... Air guitar...<n>Doesn't matter which!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...She's gotten completely<n>sidetracked.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Night falls, and we arrive at a nearly<n>empty park. The only
sound around us<n>is the rustling of leaves in the wind.<n>Well,
that, and...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: H-huh?! What's that?!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
That noise... It sounds like a flute<n>those wandering monks
use!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe that one's just out<n>here alone, playing by
themselves!<n>Now that's confidence! Talk about<n>believing
in yourself!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Do you think... I could do the same?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
No, not yet! I'm not even close to their<n>level! I still have a
ways to go before I<n>can be a monk, don't I?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon looks my way, her gaze<n>determined yet
strangely hollow. On<n>her face is the expression of a lost<n>
soul.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Wha?!
choice_data_list: What is it that you want to be?
What is it that you want to be?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: What I want to be? Isn't it obvious?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ...Oh. That's what you mean.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You're right. I'm not trying to become<n>a monk, a rapper, or
an air drummer.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I'm trying to be... an Umadol.
choice_data_list: Input is only meant to be food for thought.
Input is only meant to be food for thought.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for reminding me... I almost<n>lost sight of what
really matters.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, I'm glad you came along. I<n>would've been running
around in<n>circles on my own.
choice_data_list: What inspired you the most today?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hm... The movie had amazing acting,<n>but the parade showed
off some<n>incredible stunts.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
The rap battle was intense in a good<n>way, and the air drums
were crazy<n>impressive. As for the monk, well...<n>I'm still
shocked we just randomly<n>ran into one.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But they all shared one thing in<n>common—they believed in
themselves<n>and stuck to their own paths! So... Oh!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: That's it! What I liked the most was<n>the way they all shined!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Every performer and their audiences<n>had a sparkle in their
eyes! ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Well, actually, I don't know if the<n>monk had a sparkle. I
didn't get to<n>see their face... But anyway!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Everyone gave everything for their<n>performances, and it
inspired all the<n>people watching!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Isn't that amazing? It makes me<n>want to light up the world
for other<n>people too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, the next day...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer! Have you heard of fire<n>dancing before?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...I admire the desire to learn, but she<n>is way too easily
influenced. I'll have<n>to keep an eye on her moving<n>
forward.
